m_szDocTitle: How Hybrid Cars Differ from Conventional Vehicles
m_szDocSumamry: How Hybrid Cars Differ from Conventional Vehicles Published on July 11, 2007 at 1:51 PM IOP Publishing is pleased to announce the online publication of “How hybrid-electric vehicles are different from conventional vehicles: the effect of weight and power on fuel consumption” in the widely-respected journal Environmental Research Letters (erl.iop.org). The study compares the fuel consumption of hybrid electric vehicles for sale in the United States in 2007 to equivalent conventional vehicles.
